author: Tim Albertson
comment: I really like this launcher, as I use it with my moto 360. However, I've had a bug where the watch gets stuck on the multi-tasker. Also despite me having it off in the settings, the multi-tasker is still there. Lastly, the quick setting toggles do not work on my Nexus 6; this is a fantastic feature but I hope the Dev can fix this and the other bugs with this app. Very convenient app and highly recommend it, despite the bugs.

reply.author: Sweet Pixel Studio
reply.content: Hey Tim. I have tested this app on lollipop & they seem to be working great. The device itself isn't the issue cuz it depends on the OS. We can sort out the issues you are facing, if you contact me on email.

title: Great but needs improvement

author: Kevin Kindler
comment: There is no option to alphabetize or hide apps in the menu. There is no option to change the size of the icons or the font. App switcher shows 6 apps, but does not let you close any of them. I like the direction it is going though, and with these changes I'd improve my rating
title: Still needs some work

author: mohsin tariq
comment: Hey there... your app is one of the best app i have ever seen but the main thing is that i am not getting the option for always on mode... kindly help me through it so that i will give u 5 stars for it
title: Dont know how to open always on mode

author: Balthazar Loglia
comment: Only thing this launcher needs is multiple icon sizes, and why does the background color gradient? Other than that and (alot of) misc bugs in the app setting this is the perfect launcher for android wear!!
title: Super light weight almost pefect.!

author: Snugglewumps
comment: It works the way I want it to except for one thing, on my lg g watch the background glitches out when the transperancy is at 0 (or anything that isn't 100%), it shows 4 very glitched screens of the launcher in the background instead of my clock. This could be a problem with my watch because I was also having trouble with wear mini launcher (but this is different altogether) but could you please try and fix this because I love this launcher. Other than that when the background is solid this is a great launch

reply.author: Sweet Pixel Studio
reply.content: It might be caused by the watch face. During testing this issue wasn't found. If you like the app, update your ratings.

title: It's okay...

author: Alex Lewis
comment: Have tried multiple times with my 360 and GS4, failed miserably. Tried with new updates, best functionality yet. 3 stars for now, more with time.

reply.author: Sweet Pixel Studio
reply.content: It didn't brick the device for thousands of other people who are using this app, so there is no need for your misleading comment.

title: Galaxy S4 Moto 360 Issues appear resolved

author: Cody Lusk
comment: Unfortunately, it's pretty outdated. Works on Android Wear 2.0, but not perfectly. The hotzones are designed more for Square screens.

author: Chris Wink
comment: Seems to be developed for square screen watches. Impossible to use on round screen
title: Doesn't work very well on round screens

author: Alex Nicolaou
comment: It's very good app, only 2 things missing, the service 'find my phone ' need's to fix the toasted message on the phone. The other problem is the need of more customization on launcher such as app image size and font size. Overall is a very quality app!
title: Great job !

author: Konkon K
comment: Please add the ability to sort the apps in the launcher, at least alphabetically, though I would prefer being able to drag and reorder the wear apps through the phone side. Being able to hide certain apps from appearing in the launcher would be a great feature to add too.
title: Like the look and feel but missing something crucial

author: nadds nadda
comment: Good attempt but it just adds quick toggles and an annoying ram screen that stops you swiping left, you can easily get a way better experience out "wear mini launcher "
title: Good attempt but useless

author: Constantine Furkan Doğan
comment: Swipe mode is hard to control. Need to try couple of times to get in the menu. Halo mode is an amazing concept, only problem with that is the halo(button) is annoying. Can you please add a function to customize it? Something to change the size and specially colour, for black watchfaces :(
title: Its good but

author: Ayush Bhansali
comment: With the other launchers there's a bug where the ram screen keeps showing up but if u use floating launcher, not only is it nice and fast, but no ram bug
title: Floating one is great

author: Rafael Gonzalez
comment: This is the way multitasking should be on a watch I'm not sure if it uses too much memory or not but it works really well I'm very happy with it. Highly recommended.
title: Beautiful

author: Sudeep Bhowmick
comment: Works great on G Watch. The only issue is a slight background canvas issue when looking at the column launcher. If that can be fixed it will look top class.
title: Works great on LG G watch

author: Justin G
comment: I can't stand the right to left swipe "ram" screen. Please add ability to disable!
title: Great, but...

author: Sandro Trinity
comment: Keeping your finger on a tiny screen is not very practical, you cover the icons with your finger, so you need to keep moving it to see all the apps. I disliked it.
title: Not very practical

author: Wesley Cragwall
comment: Sometimes if I disconnect or connect my watch the "lost phone" sound will start playing on my phone until I turn it off.

reply.author: Sweet Pixel Studio
reply.content: Turn this feature off from the phone side app.

title: Randomly uses the lost phone feature.

author: Daniel Arce Rodriguez
comment: Works fine and love the multimedia controls. But would like more options like: no vibrations, alphabetize launcher, to draw launcher from the right, hide certain apps. And the multitasker  keeps enabling itself automatically 10 min after I disable it. Please fix for better rating.
title: Lg watch r with HTC one

author: Cameron Kaye
comment: Whenever i go on the activity screen it freezes and it wont go out of it without me resetting my watch

reply.author: Sweet Pixel Studio
reply.content: Its Android wear issue, not Swipify issue. Internet is full of reports about bugs in Android Wear

title: Freezes a lot

author: Abdul Jabbar
comment: I loved it because of always screen on...but its not stable..
title: Plzzz fix crashing issues..

author: Weston Wolfer
comment: Isn't working on my Moto 360. My phone is running the lollipop developer preview and the app doesn't install on my watch.
title: Doesn't Work

author: Janak Saini
comment: I installed the app on my phone but it wouldn't sync to my watch (moto 360). I re-synced apps it still wouldn't install.
title: It won't install on my watch!

author: John Marston
comment: I hate the ram please remove the ram and improve the app more then that

author: Christian Simpson
comment: It still can't put most used apps first

author: Gary W
comment: App does not appear to be compatible with the Asus Zenwatch.
title: Not for Asus

author: Garrett Jones
comment: I like it better than wear mini launcher. The app drawer pulls much more consistent. The ability to set the drawer thickness is also great. Would like the ability to resize apps in the drawer.
title: Good on 360

author: kris kishore
comment: Bricked my watch after installing it.

author: Steven Sauder
comment: If you know how to use it it works  great. I have the Moto 360 and it works perfectly once I got the hang of it.

reply.author: Sweet Pixel Studio
reply.content: Thanks for the appreciation. If you could make a tutorial video explaining Swipify, I would put it here on play store. It is hard for some people to understand this app.

title: Great app

author: Dennis Bareis
comment: But option to disable bounce animation doesn't work properly and can't sort or filter apps.
title: Very good

author: Hesam Movagharnejad
comment: I was lookin' for an app to keep my Moto360 display always On, so finally i found it,
title: Display always On,

author: Dinico Win
comment: Ugly u.i
title: Material the app

author: dan Bdan
comment: can't seem to select custom list of apps
title: ok but

author: Enrique E. de Orta
comment: Buggy
title: Not sony sw3 friendly..

author: Bogdan Bogodai
comment: Useful app but ...freezing is a major issue.

reply.author: Sweet Pixel Studio
reply.content: Its Android wear issue, not Swipify issue. Internet is full of reports about bugs in Android Wear

author: Shane Kosieradzki
comment: I whish I could choose which apps where is the short cut window
title: Great app but...

author: Chris Rollison
comment: Needs the ability to hide apps.
title: Nice, but needs more features

comment: Would love to see most used apps sort to the top
title: Great potential

author: Ronald Valdes
comment: Started working better after lollipop update... No more fc
title: Works

author: Mad Bull
comment: Doesn't work
